title: Olympian Kaylin Richardson talks new adventure
text:
Olympian Kaylin Richardson talks new adventure She began racing at Hyland Hills in Bloomington at the age of nine. Post to Facebook Olympian Kaylin Richardson talks new adventure She began racing at Hyland Hills in Bloomington at the age of nine.   kare11.com: http://www.kare11.com/story/sports/2015/10/22/olympian-kaylin-richardson-talks-new-adventure/74423016/   Join the Conversation To   Olympian Kaylin Richardson talks new adventure Kaylin Richardson KARE CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
GOLDEN VALLEY, Minn - She began racing at Hyland Hills in Bloomington at the age of nine. 
Since that time, Kaylin Richardson of Edina has competed in two Winter Olympics games, in Torino, Italy in 2006 and Vancouver in 2010. 
After that, she retired from competitive World Cup racing, and discovered the sport of extreme skiing. It was here, she teamed up on a globetrotting adventure, being featured in Warren Miller films. 
Now, she will help host the Minnesota premier of "Chasing Shadows," the latest offering of Warren Miller Entertainment, a cinematic masterpiece that follows Kaylin on a back country adventure through Alaska. 
The film will be shown at the State Theater in Minneapolis on Friday and Saturday. Read or Share this story: http://www.kare11.com/story/sports/2015/10/22/olympian-kaylin-richardson-talks-new-adventure/74423016/ TOP VIDEOS
